# init(attachment:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new storage device configuration with the specified attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
init(attachment: VZStorageDeviceAttachment)
```

## Parameters

- **attachment**: A [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZStorageDeviceAttachment] object.
